attributes.description:
SPOTLESS !!!!!!

Good Day 
My name Is Rikus From VW Wonderboom McCarthy 
We would like to Thank you for the Enquiry and we will gladly assist 

PLEASE note we Do assist with Finance , At all Normal banks and no ITC or Bad Debt will be approved 
Also You must have a Valid Drivers License and Earn More thank R 8500.00 Per moth 

We do assist With trade in of Current cars and we will gladly Deliver nationwide 

Kindly Contact me ASAP ! as stock is Scares and I will be overjoyed to Assist 

Have a Super Day 
yours in Customer Excellence 
Regards

attributes.description:
The 2018 Toyota Corolla 1.6 Prestige is a modernised version of a dependable quality family size sedan. Whether you decide to use it for work or leisure, let you assure you this vehicle is in it for the long run with features that include power steering, multi-function steering wheel, wireless smartphone connectivity, air conditioning, fully functioning electric windows, black leather seats, reverse camera, central locking remote, electric mirrors, trip computer, radio/CD/USB/AUX input and excellent boot space and perfect legroom for both driver and rear passengers. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional. 
#10250
